00025   PedestalProcessor aPedestalProcessor;
00026 
00027   PedestalProcessor::PedestalProcessor() : Processor("PedestalProcessor")
00028   {
00029     _description = "Pedestal subtraction using pedestal extracted on the fly from the same run.";
00030 
00031     registerProcessorParameter("InputCollection",
00032                                "Name of input collection of CaliceHits",
00033                                _inputColName,
00034                                std::string("RawCaliceHits"));
00035 
00036     registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollection",
00037                                "Name of output collection of pedestals",
00038                                _outputColName,
00039                                std::string("Pedestal"));
00040 
00041     registerProcessorParameter( "MappingProcessorName" ,
00042                                 "Name of the MappingProcessor instance that provides"
00043                                 " the geometry of the detector.",
00044                                 _mappingProcessorName,
00045                                 std::string("AHC") ) ;
00046 
00047     registerProcessorParameter("minPedNumber", "Minimum number of pedestal "
00048                                "before the pedestal value is considered "
00049                                "valid and pedestal substraction is applied",
00050                                _minPedNumber,
00051                                (int) 450);
00052 
00053     registerProcessorParameter("skipMinimumEvent", "Skip the mipPedNumber events",
00054                                _skipMinimumEvent,
00055                                (bool) false);
00056 
00057   }

00074   /*****************************************************************************/
00075   void PedestalProcessor::init(){
00076     printParameters();
00077 
00078     _pedCounter = 0;
00079 
00080     std::stringstream message;
00081     message << "undefined conditionsdata: ";
00082     bool error = false;
00083 
00084    /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00085     _mapper = dynamic_cast<const AhcMapper*>(MappingProcessor::getMapper(_mappingProcessorName));
00086     if ( ! _mapper )
00087       {
00088         message << "MappingProcessor::getMapper("<< _mappingProcessorName
00089                 << ") did not return a valid mapper." << endl;
00090         error = true;
00091       }
00092 
00093     if (error)
00094       {
00095         streamlog_out(ERROR) << message.str();
00096         throw marlin::StopProcessingException(this);
00097       }
00098 
00099     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00100     /*-------------------------------------------------------------*/
00101     _colPedestal = NULL;
00102 
00103     _conditionsHandler = new CALICE::RunTimeConditionsHandler(_outputColName);
00104     lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->registerHandler(_outputColName,_conditionsHandler);
00105   }
00106 
00107   /*****************************************************************************/
00108   /*                                                                           */
00109   /*                                                                           */
00110   /*                                                                           */
00111   /*                                                                           */
00112   /*****************************************************************************/
00113   void PedestalProcessor::updateMapper()
00114   {
00115     _ahcMaxNumberOfModules  = _mapper->getMaxModule();
00116     _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels = _mapper->getMaxChannel();
00117     _ahcMaxNumberOfChips    = _mapper->getMaxChip();
00118     _ahcMaxNumberOfCells    = _ahcMaxNumberOfChannels * _ahcMaxNumberOfChips;
00119 
00120     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"\n\n\n ahcMaxNumberOfModules: "<<_ahcMaxNumberOfModules
00121                  <<" ahcMaxNumberOfChannels: "<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChannels
00122                  <<" ahcMaxNumberOfChips: "<<_ahcMaxNumberOfChips
00123                  <<" ahxMaxNumberOfCells: "<<_ahcMaxNumberOfCells
00124                  <<endl;
00125     
00126     _pedSum       = new float *[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00127     _pedSumSquare = new float *[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00128     _pedNum       = new unsigned int *[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00129     _ped          = new float *[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00130     _pedError     = new float *[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00131 
00132     for (unsigned int mod = 0; mod < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules; ++mod)
00133       {
00134         _pedSum[mod]       = new float [_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00135         _pedSumSquare[mod] = new float[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00136         _pedNum[mod]       = new unsigned int[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00137         _ped[mod]          = new float[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00138         _pedError[mod]     = new float[_ahcMaxNumberOfCells];
00139 
00140         for (unsigned int cell = 0; cell < _ahcMaxNumberOfCells; ++cell)
00141           {
00142             _pedSum[mod][cell]       = 0;
00143             _pedSumSquare[mod][cell] = 0;
00144             _pedNum[mod][cell]       = 0;
00145             _ped[mod][cell]          = 0;
00146             _pedError[mod][cell]     = 0;
00147           }
00148 
00149       }
00150 
00151     _mapperVersion = _mapper->getVersion();
00152   }
00153 
00154   /*****************************************************************************/
00155   /*                                                                           */
00156   /*                                                                           */
00157   /*                                                                           */
00158   /*                                                                           */
00159   /*****************************************************************************/
00160   void PedestalProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent *evt)
00161   {
00162     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<"\n EVENT: "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<endl;
00163  
00164     TriggerBits old_trigger_conf=_triggerConf;
00165     _triggerConf = evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_TRIGGER_CONF);
00166 
00167     /*check mapper version and update mapper if necessary,
00168       since the mapper gets updated with the first event*/
00169     if (_mapperVersion != _mapper->getVersion()) this->updateMapper();
00170 
00171     /*look only at pedestal events*/
00172     TriggerBits trigBits(evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT));
00173 
00174     if( _triggerConf != old_trigger_conf ) {
00175       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << " --------- Trigger Conf Change Occured -----------" << endl;
00176       if( trigBits.isPurePedestalTrigger() == 1 && _triggerConf.getTriggerBits() == 4 ){
00177         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Yes, it is Trigger configure 1. Cleanup Pedestal." << endl;
00178         //prepare for next 500 pedestal
00179         for (unsigned short mod = 1; mod < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules; ++mod)
00180           {
00181             for (unsigned short cell = 0; cell < _ahcMaxNumberOfCells; ++cell)
00182               {
00183                 _pedSum[mod][cell]        = 0.0;
00184                 _pedSumSquare[mod][cell]  = 0.0;
00185                 _pedNum[mod][cell]        = 0;
00186               }
00187           }
00188         _pedCounter = 0;
00189       }else if( trigBits.isCalibTrigger() == 1 &&  _triggerConf.getTriggerBits() == 20 ){
00190         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Yes, it is Trigger configure 2.  Update  Pedestal." << endl;
00191         streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "There are in total "<< _pedCounter <<" pedestal events in last configuration will be used for the following beam event." <<endl;
00192 
00193         _colPedestal = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00194 
00195         /*AHCAL MODULE: module starts from 1, not from 0!*/
00196         /*
00197           BE AWARE: done for 38x216 channels! no check for coarse modules!
00198         */
00199         for (unsigned short mod = 1; mod < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules; ++mod)
00200           {
00201             for (unsigned short cell = 0; cell < _ahcMaxNumberOfCells; ++cell)
00202               {
00203                 unsigned int channel = cell % 18;
00204                 unsigned int chip    = cell/18;
00205                 
00206                 try
00207                   {
00208                     const int cellID = _mapper->getCellIDFromModChipChan(mod, chip, channel);
00209                     
00210                     SimpleValue *pedestal = new SimpleValue(cellID, _ped[mod][cell],
00211                                                             _pedError[mod][cell], 0);
00212                     
00213                     _colPedestal->addElement(pedestal);
00214                     
00215                     streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" mod="<<mod<<" cell="<<cell<<" pedestal="
00216                                  <<_ped[mod][cell]<<" +- "
00217                                  <<_pedError[mod][cell]
00218                                  <<" pedNum="<<_pedNum[mod][cell]
00219                                  <<" pedSum="<<_pedSum[mod][cell]
00220                                  <<" pedSumSquare="<<_pedSumSquare[mod][cell]
00221                                  <<endl;
00222                   }
00223                 catch(BadDataException& e)
00224                   {
00225                     streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " invalid cell id for module " << mod 
00226                                   <<", chip "<<chip
00227                                   <<" and channel "<<channel<<" \n"<< e.what() 
00228                                   << endl;
00229                   }
00230               }
00231           }/*------------- end of loop over mod--------------*/
00232         
00233         const std::string encoding = _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding();
00234         LCParameters &theParam =  _colPedestal->parameters();
00235         theParam.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding, encoding);
00236         
00237         _conditionsHandler->update(_colPedestal);
00238         
00239         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" updating colPedestal: "<<_colPedestal<<endl;
00240         
00241       }else{ 
00242         streamlog_out(DEBUG) <<"Yes, it is trigger configuration 3. PedestalProcessor will do nothing, return!" <<std::endl;
00243         return;
00244       }
00245     }else if( _pedCounter == 501 ){ //For pure noise runs
00246 
00247       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "For pure noise runs.  Update  Pedestal once after first 500 events." << endl;
00248 
00249       _colPedestal = new LCCollectionVec(LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT);
00250 
00251       /*AHCAL MODULE: module starts from 1, not from 0!*/
00252       /*
00253         BE AWARE: done for 38x216 channels! no check for coarse modules!
00254       */
00255       for (unsigned short mod = 1; mod < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules; ++mod)
00256         {
00257           for (unsigned short cell = 0; cell < _ahcMaxNumberOfCells; ++cell)
00258             {
00259               unsigned int channel = cell % 18;
00260               unsigned int chip    = cell/18;
00261               
00262               try
00263                 {
00264                   const int cellID = _mapper->getCellIDFromModChipChan(mod, chip, channel);
00265                   
00266                   SimpleValue *pedestal = new SimpleValue(cellID, _ped[mod][cell],
00267                                                           _pedError[mod][cell], 0);
00268                   
00269                   _colPedestal->addElement(pedestal);
00270                   
00271                   streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" mod="<<mod<<" cell="<<cell<<" pedestal="
00272                                <<_ped[mod][cell]<<" +- "
00273                                <<_pedError[mod][cell]
00274                                <<" pedNum="<<_pedNum[mod][cell]
00275                                <<" pedSum="<<_pedSum[mod][cell]
00276                                <<" pedSumSquare="<<_pedSumSquare[mod][cell]
00277                                <<endl;
00278                 }
00279               catch(BadDataException& e)
00280                 {
00281                   streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << " invalid cell id for module " << mod 
00282                                 <<", chip "<<chip
00283                                 <<" and channel "<<channel<<" \n"<< e.what() 
00284                                 << endl;
00285                 }
00286             }
00287         }/*------------- end of loop over mod--------------*/
00288       
00289       const std::string encoding = _mapper->getDecoder()->getCellIDEncoding();
00290       LCParameters &theParam =  _colPedestal->parameters();
00291       theParam.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding, encoding);
00292       
00293       _conditionsHandler->update(_colPedestal);
00294       
00295       streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"updating colPedestal for each 500 pedstal counts: "<<_colPedestal<<endl;
00296     }    
00297     
00298 
00299     if ( (!trigBits.isPurePedestalTrigger()) || (_triggerConf.getTriggerBits() != 4) )  
00300       {
00301         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) <<" This event ("<<evt->getEventNumber()
00302                      <<") has no pure pedestal trigger, return"<<endl;
00303         return;
00304       }
00305 
00306   
00307     LCCollection *inputCol = NULL;
00308     try
00309       {
00310         inputCol = evt->getCollection(_inputColName);
00311         int noElem = inputCol->getNumberOfElements();
00312 
00313         streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"  noElem = "<<noElem<<endl;
00314 
00315 
00316         if (noElem > 0)
00317           {
00318             for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(noElem); ++i)
00319               {
00320                 LCObject *obj = inputCol->getElementAt(i);
00321                 AdcBlock adcBlock(obj);
00322 
00323                short channel = adcBlock.getMultiplexPosition();
00324 
00325 
00326                 for (unsigned short chip = 0; chip < _ahcMaxNumberOfChips; ++chip)
00327                   {
00328                     bool isValid;
00329                     const int daqChannelID = _mapper->getDecoder()->getDAQID(adcBlock.getCrateID(),//crate 
00330                                                                              adcBlock.getSlotID(),//slot
00331                                                                              adcBlock.getBoardFrontEnd(),//fe
00332                                                                              chip, channel);
00333                     const unsigned int module = _mapper->getModuleFromDAQID(daqChannelID, isValid);
00334                     if ( ! isValid ) continue;
00335 
00336                     unsigned short cell = chip * 18 + channel;
00337 
00338                     assert( (module < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules) && (cell < _ahcMaxNumberOfCells));
00339 
00340                     float energy = (float)adcBlock.getAdcVal(chip);
00341 
00342                     _pedSum[module][cell] += energy;
00343                     _pedSumSquare[module][cell] += pow(energy, 2);
00344                     _pedNum[module][cell]++;
00345 
00346                     /*the pedestal is the average of all pedestal "hits"*/
00347                     _ped[module][cell] = _pedSum[module][cell]/_pedNum[module][cell];
00348 
00349                     /*the pedestal error is RMS/sqrt(N)*/
00350                     if (_pedNum[module][cell] > 0)
00351                       _pedError[module][cell] =
00352                         sqrt(_pedSumSquare[module][cell]/_pedNum[module][cell]
00353                              - pow(_pedSum[module][cell]/_pedNum[module][cell],2))
00354                         /sqrt(_pedNum[module][cell]);
00355                     else
00356                       _pedError[module][cell] = 0;
00357 
00358 
00359                   }/*------------------------- end loop over chip ----------------------------*/
00360               }/*----------------------------- end loop over i < noElem ---------------------*/
00361 
00362 
00363             _pedCounter++;
00364 
00365 
00366 
00367             if (_skipMinimumEvent && _pedCounter < _minPedNumber) 
00368               {
00369                 streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<"skip event "<<evt->getEventNumber()<<endl;
00370                 throw marlin::SkipEventException(this);
00371               }
00372 
00373           }/*--------- end if (noElem > 0)---------------------------*/
00374 
00375 
00376       }
00377     catch (EVENT::DataNotAvailableException e){
00378       streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "No pedestal collection " << _inputColName << " found" << endl;
00379       return;
00380     }
00381 
00382   }
00383 
00384   /*****************************************************************************/
00385   /*                                                                           */
00386   /*                                                                           */
00387   /*                                                                           */
00388   /*                                                                           */
00389   /*****************************************************************************/
00390   void PedestalProcessor::end()
00391   {
00392     for (unsigned int mod = 0; mod < _ahcMaxNumberOfModules; ++mod)
00393       {
00394         delete [] _pedSum[mod] ;
00395         delete [] _pedSumSquare[mod];
00396         delete [] _pedNum[mod];
00397         delete [] _ped[mod];
00398         delete [] _pedError[mod];
00399       }
00400 
00401     delete [] _pedSum ;
00402     delete [] _pedSumSquare;
00403     delete [] _pedNum;
00404     delete [] _ped;
00405     delete [] _pedError;
00406       
00407   }
00408     
00409 }/*end of namespace CALICE*/
